experience.title: Actuarial Intern
experience.description: Assisted senior actuaries with data validation and preparation for quarterly financial reporting. Utilized Excel and SQL to support pricing model updates and performed basic sensitivity analysis on mortality assumptions.

experience.title: Quantitative Finance Research Assistant
experience.description: Collaborated with faculty on statistical modeling projects involving time-series analysis. Cleaned large datasets and generated visualizations to communicate findings related to market volatility.

experience.title: Mathematics Tutor
experience.description: Provided individual and group instruction for undergraduate students in Calculus, Linear Algebra, and Probability Theory, helping students master complex mathematical proofs and applications.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience in job field
